introduction: SYNOPSISAfter being abandoned by Tae-su, Soo-kyung meets a man in his 40's named Moo-heum. She likes the fatherliness of Moo-heum and he soon falls in love with her. When Soo-kyung begins to show interest in Nam-jin, Tae-su's brother-in-law, Tae-su reveals her past to Nam-jin to discourage their union. But Nam-jin does not care about her past and continues to see her. Tae-su loses control and tries to choke Soo-kyung but Moo-heum drives over to save her. When Tae-su accidentally is run over while trying to push her into the oncoming car, she feels guilty that Moo-heum must take the blame for Tae-su's death. She laments her selfishness as she thinks about Moo-heum.故事守寡四十年，苏颂挂在父亲的贞花上，茉slowly慢慢地爱上了她。他是苏珊的妻子苏珊的妻子的姐姐，她是太乙的妻子的妹妹。她醒了过来，看着她的名字，但她不在乎她的过去，她目睹了她的无意识Tae Sue扼住了他的头。苏京是因为自己造成的太子而杀人的，他推水而死，而不是被车撞。困惑到思考的红海，感叹太自私的爱是在总督和水培的墓被转移的步伐，以找到自己的方式。
